meanings.sent1: The farmer used mulies to plow the fields.
meanings.sent2: The mulies carried heavy loads up the mountain.
meanings.sent3: Why did the mulies refuse to work? Because they wanted a break!
meanings.sent4: The mulies stood strong and steady, like reliable workers.
meanings.sent5: The image of the mulies working diligently stayed in his mind.

meanings.definition: The plural form of mulie, meaning a hybrid offspring of a male donkey and a female horse.
meanings.sent1: The ranch had a herd of mulies grazing in the pasture.
meanings.sent2: The mulies had a mix of features from both donkeys and horses.
meanings.sent3: The mulies played together, showing off their unique traits.
meanings.sent4: The mulies symbolized the blending of two different animals.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the mulies trotting around was quite fascinating.
